item.title: Quick preview of nohup command
item.description: Nohup is a command line to start a program from a terminal, and be able to quit the terminal without exiting your program

item.title: Being a developer beyong simple code
item.description: What it means beeing a developer? Far from the mythologie convey by pop culture, a brief description of what it mean nowdays, and what is not only about code anymore
